mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ten_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, mo_ta, the_tich_luu_tru, the_tich_kha_dung, ma_khu_vuc FROM chi_tiet_khu_vuc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chi_tiet_khu_vuc (ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ten_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, mo_ta, the_tich_luu_tru, the_tich_kha_dung, ma_khu_vuc) VALUES (#{maChiTietKhuVuc}, #{tenChiTietKhuVuc}, #{moTa}, #{theTichLuuTru}, #{theTichKhaDung}, #{maKhuVuc});
mapper.update: UPDATE chi_tiet_khu_vuc SET ten_chi_tiet_khu_vuc = #{tenChiTietKhuVuc}, mo_ta = #{moTa}, the_tich_luu_tru = #{theTichLuuTru}, the_tich_kha_dung = #{theTichKhaDung}, ma_khu_vuc = #{maKhuVuc} WHERE ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc = #{maChiTietKhuVuc};
mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ten_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, mo_ta, the_tich_luu_tru, the_tich_kha_dung, ma_khu_vuc FROM chi_tiet_khu_vuc WHERE ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc = #{maChiTietKhuVuc};

SELECT ctkv.ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, ctkv.ten_chi_tiet_khu_vuc, sp.ten_san_pham FROM danh_muc dm JOIN san_pham sp ON dm.sys_id_danh_muc = sp.sys_id_danh_muc JOIN kho k ON dm.ma_kho = k.ma_kho JOIN khu_vuc kv ON k.ma_kho = kv.ma_kho JOIN chi_tiet_khu_vuc ctkv ON ctkv.ma_khu_vuc = kv.ma_khu_vuc WHERE sp.sys_id_san_pham = #{sysIdSanPham} AND ctkv.ma_chi_tiet_khu_vuc LIKE 'CT_KHO%';
